p: Toxicity: An aqueous extract of E. alba did not cause any toxicity at a dose of 2.0 g/kg orally and 200 mg/kg by intravenous and intraperitoneal routes. The LD 50 in mice were 7.841 g/kg, 302.8 and 328.3 mg/kg for oral and intravenous and intraperitoneal routes respectively [ 137]. The alcoholic extract did not show any toxicity in rats and mice and the minimum lethal dose was found to be greater than 2.0 g/kg when given orally and intraperitonially in mice [ 214].
